name: Lost Christmas (Pan Sartre)
description:
One mulled wine too many and that's it ... during a daring turning manoeuvre, Santa lost a few presents. Help him to collect the lost presents to save christmas!

This is my first pico8 project and was made within a month. At the moment it only consists of a small level and does without sound output to make the Christmas silence more contemplative... (There was simply no time for sound design)
